{"step_by_step_thinking": "Document 0 states that in a study, TME with IONM was associated with significant lower rates of urinary and anorectal dysfunction. Document 2 concludes that pIONM is safe and has the potential to improve functional outcomes in rectal cancer patients undergoing TME. Document 24 states that in a prospective 2-year follow-up study, pelvic intraoperative neuromonitoring was associated with significantly lower rates of urinary and sexual dysfunction.
